hostname ePE_A
buggy

logging buffered debug 10240
logging file debug /rtr/run/logs/freertr.log
logging rotate 655360000 /rtr/run/logs/freertr.old
logging syslog informational local7 172.20.20.1
!
crypto rsakey rsa import $v10$
!
crypto dsakey dsa import $v10$
!
crypto ecdsakey ecdsa import $v10$TUhNQ0FRRUVIeFNYanl3WUxLSldndERwZEh6TE84bDN4d2NQdmFZQ0ZnN0JvK2FEYUlPZ0J3WUZLNEVFQUFxaFJBTkNBQVRkc3ovL1VQMFNnNXhVV3FmL2tqd0tVVi9mYkFIUjQ0VUE4cy9qT2xmSXhETlNxVFpLbndTYVd5RjRFTWFTYjRiUFBhSGV0RG9MRlhyM0s5cHFLUTM3
!
aaa userlist usr
 username rare
 username rare password $v10$cmFyZQ==
 exit
!
scheduler errors
 time 600000
 delay 30000
 command clear errors freerror@nop.hu
 start
 exit
!
access-list custA_Filter
 sequence 10 permit all 100.50.80.0 255.255.255.248 all any all
 sequence 20 deny all any all any all
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL4
 sequence 10 permit 0.0.0.0/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL6
 sequence 10 permit ::/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
bundle 10
 exit
!
bundle 11
 exit
!
bundle 30
 exit
!
vrf definition DEF_SEGROUT
 rd 200:1
 rt4import 100:100
 rt4export 100:100
 rt6import 100:100
 rt6export 100:100
 exit
!
vrf definition OOB
 exit
!
router ospf4 10
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 router-id 122.200.200.1
 traffeng-id 0.0.0.0
 segrout 500 base 12000
 area 0 enable
 area 0 spf-ecmp
 area 0 segrout
 ecmp
 exit
!
interface loopback1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 122.200.200.1 255.255.255.255
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 passive
 router ospf4 10 segrout index 310
 router ospf4 10 segrout node
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle10
 description eASBRR1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 20.200.135.2 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle11
 description eASBRR2
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 20.200.135.6 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle30
 description eCE_A
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 100.50.80.6 255.255.255.252
 ipv4 access-group-out custA_Filter
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet1
 description [B30]eCE_A
 bundle-group 30
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet2
 description [B10]eASBRR1_eth1
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 10
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet255
 description MGMT
 vrf forwarding OOB
 ipv4 address 172.20.20.10 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
 no log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet3
 description [B11]eASBRR2_eth1
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 11
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
router bgp4 17000
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 local-as 17000
 router-id 122.200.200.1
 address-family labeled vpnuni
 !
 template BGP-LU remote-as 17000
 template BGP-LU local-as 17000
 template BGP-LU address-family labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU distance 200
 template BGP-LU additional-path-rx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU additional-path-tx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU update-source loopback1
 template BGP-LU segrout
 !
 neighbor 122.200.200.100 template BGP-LU
 !
 neighbor 122.200.200.200 template BGP-LU
 !
 !
 redistribute connected
 exit

 no exec authorization

 exit
